typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Campo as string
}
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LecturaADL
LecturaADL filter(toInteger(byName($Campo))== 3) ~> FilterCategoria
FilterCategoria sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['productCategory.txt'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
